casebody.data:
DRIGGERS, et al.
v.
JOYNER, et al. No. 353P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Oct. 27, 2015.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of October 2015 by Defendants for Extension of Time to Respond to Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of October 2015."
